adapter_spec.input_suffix: Please answer the concept name only.

input.text: Given the context 'It has also been reviewed by " Times Higher Education ".', neglect your knowledge about Times Higher Education and select the most contextually related concept for it from the concept set: Magazine, Document, WrittenWork, PeriodicalLiterature, Work.

Given the context 'Harris was one of the most hyped running back recruits since Bryce Brown in 2009 and Leonard Fournette in 2014.', neglect your knowledge about Bryce Brown and select the most contextually related concept for it from the concept set: AmericanFootballPlayer, Athlete, GridironFootballPlayer, Person.

Given the context 'He then was a head coach for the Calgary Bronks for five seasons.', neglect your knowledge about Calgary Bronks and select the most contextually related concept for it from the concept set: SportsClub, Group, Organisation, CanadianFootballTeam, SportsTeam.

Given the context 'He graduated from the Escuela Nacional de Arte de La Habana with a degree in theatrical direction.', neglect your knowledge about Escuela Nacional de Arte de La Habana and select the most contextually related concept for it from the concept set: Group, Organisation, School, EducationalInstitution.

Given the context 'With Wilhelm Dittenberger , he edited "Die inschriften von Olympia", based on the inscriptions found at Olympia.', neglect your knowledge about Wilhelm Dittenberger and select the most contextually related concept for it from the concept set: BusinessPerson, Writer, Scientist, Historian, Person.
